meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Gibbs Lizzie O'Leary Chris Matthews Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6376.

div.div:
2012 Power Players Week game 1.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Robert Gibbs, a former press secretary from the Obama White House
Lizzie O'Leary, an aviation and regulation correspondent from CNN
Chris Matthews, a TV host from Hardball and The Chris Matthews Show

tr.td: HARDBALL

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES CROSSWORD CLUES "E"

tr.td: SECRETARY'S DAY
(Alex: You have to identify the Cabinet post.)
MY WEEK WITH MARYLAND
YOGA
PRESS BRIEFING

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Chris: Who is Gary Powers?)
(Alex: We need the full name.)
(Chris: [Insistently] Who is Gary Powers?)
(Alex: No.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Lizzie.)
(Lizzie: Who is [*]?)
(Alex: Full name. Lizzie benefits. She selects.)

Francis Gary Powers

ChrisLizzie
')

tr.td: AWARDS
This performer is the only person to win an Emmy, the Mark Twain Prize & the Spingarn Medal
Chris
Lizzie
Robert
3rd place: $10,000 to La Salle College High School
2nd place: $10,000 to 826DC
Winner: $50,000 to the Pine Hills Literacy Project
Chris
Lizzie
Robert

13 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W
